sentences.en: Amy stand rivet to the spot and gaze at the entrance.

sentences.en: Every nail driven should be as another rivet in the machine of the universe, you carrying on the work.

sentences.en: The West Ham crest features two crossed rivet hammers and the club has been known has the Hammers ever since

sentences.en: When an aluminum rivet is upset against a softer material, a washer must be used under the upset head to prevent eruption of the softer material.
sentences.cn: 当一个铝铆钉的镦头形成在较软的材料一边时，必需在铆钉镦头下使用垫片以防止较软材料胀裂。
